import './Post.css' import MoreVertIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreVert'; import { Users } from '../../../dummyData'; import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Post( {post}) { // console.log(post) const [likeCount, setLikeCount] = new useState(post.like) const [clicked, setClicked] = new useState(false) function increaseClick () { setLikeCount(likeCount + 1) } return (
u.id === post?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post?.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{likeCount} liked it
{post?.comment}
) }
